cluster_classes.class_description: Chemicals (amines) used in amine treating processes to remove H2S and CO2 from hydrocarbon streams.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: used in amine treating to remove H2S and CO2.

members.entity_description: A chemical used in amine treating to remove H2S and CO2 from hydrocarbon streams.

splits.name: Amine Chemicals
splits.description: Chemicals classified as amines used in treating processes to remove H2S and CO2.

splits.name: Amine Treating Materials
splits.description: Materials used in amine treating processes, not strictly classified as chemicals.

args.justification: The class 'Amine Treating Chemicals' contains both chemicals (DEA) and materials (methyldiethanolamine, monoethanolamine) with different entity_type_hints, indicating an overloaded class that should be split for schema clarity.

args.new_description: Processes involved in the treatment of sour water containing hydrogen sulfide, including associated chemicals and units.
args.justification: The current Class_Group 'Refining Process Chemicals and Units' is too narrow for a process-focused class; updating to 'Refining Process Operations and Components' better reflects the process-centric nature.

args.new_description: A process unit designed to separate components at reduced pressure to lower their boiling points.
args.justification: Aligning Class_Group with other process and unit classes for schema consistency.
